text: Aaraam Jaalakam is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by MA Venu and starring Vijayaraghavan and Chippy in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Kaviyoor Ponnamma * Maniyanpilla Raju * Aliyar * Babu Namboothiri * Beena Antony * Chippy * Jagannadha Varma * Radhamma * Vijayaraghavan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Aaraam Jaalakam
